Posts.EditableText: I'm on the blue server, my bot is called mito. I'm lvl 106. This game's pretty good, especially to begin with. After you get about lvl 80 and there's no more armour except body and shield, the game gets rather tiresome. Other than that it's a good thing to throw time at.
